page.title: 11LOCAL HOUSE PRICES.
page.content: In Upshire prices range from 100,000 for a detached house & 40 to 50,000 for a semi-detached. In 1972 the Ninefields Estate in Waltham Abbey. The estate includes flats,terraced & semi-detached houses. A 1 bedroomed flat costs 29,000, a 2 bedroomed terraced house costs 40,000 Debden Green is a very pricey area of bungalows & detached houses from 80-200,000. High Beach houses cost 250, 000 or less. The people in the area grew a great deal when Ninefields was built in 1972 The longest any person we surveyed has lved in Upshire is 78 years. The average amount of time people live in th area is 14 years.
